page.description: The {LF} command inserts one or more carriage return line feed sequences.

argument.name: Lines
argument.description: Numeric. The number of lines to advance. The line height is by default based on the default font, which is Arial, 8 point.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following script puts a blank line after the Lastname row and puts two blank lines between the Zip row and the OK button:
